agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Human Services TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Tuesday, February 26, 2019 PLACE: E2.030 CHAIR: Rep. James B. Frank The order in which bills are heard is at the discretion of the chair. *Public testimony will be limited to three (3) minutes.* HB 72 White | et al. Relating to the continuation of Medicaid benefits provided to certain children adopted from the conservatorship of the Department of Family and Protective Services. HB 157 White Relating to requiring post-placement review and reporting for child-placing agencies providing international adoption services. HB 284 Perez Relating to disclosure requirements of certain facilities that provide care for persons with Alzheimer's disease and related disorders. HB 285 Springer Relating to work requirements and employment and training services for certain persons receiving benefits under the supplemental nutrition assistance program. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
